rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: A possible cluster of bird-flu infections in Missouri has grown to include eight people, in what may be the first examples of person-to-person transmission in the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported on Friday.
